description: M3G stands for “Metadata Management and distribution system for Multiple GNSS Networks”. M3G allows to upload, validate, and distribute GNSS station metadata such as IGS-style site logs, information about local networks, DOIs, nominal data provision, data licenses attached to the daily RINEX data, etc...
name: Metadata Management and distribution system for Multiple GNSS Networks

resources.description: The Royal Observatory of Belgium (ROB) is a scientific research institution. The main activities are Reference Systems and Planetology, Seismology and Gravimetry, Astronomy and Astrophysics and Solar Physics and Space Weather.

institution.description: The Royal Observatory of Belgium (ROB) is a scientific research institution. The main activities are Reference Systems and Planetology, Seismology and Gravimetry, Astronomy and Astrophysics and Solar Physics and Space Weather.
institution.name: Royal Observatory of Belgium
